channel.title: Advice on crazyc4t
channel.description: Recent content in Advice on crazyc4t

item.title: Comeback
item.description: How to comeback and win in life First of all, let’s talk about the definition of the word comeback shall we? Comeback: a return to a former higher rank, popularity, position, prosperity, etc.

item.title: Why minimalism is important in your life
item.description: This is my first (and not last) blogpost talking about life advice and my opinions so just buckle up and enjoy the ride! What is minimalism in the first place? Is really self-explanatory isn’t it?
